citation: Proclamation under the Financial Management Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Financial Management Act 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Financial Management Act 2016 fix 1 July 2019 as the day on which that Act commences.

29 April 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 May 2019

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
